title: San Francisco 49ers NFL Helmet Shadowbox w/Colin Kaepernick card
description: Introducing mini helmet shadowbox with card. Each one features an officially licensed Riddell pocket size helmet with official football card. Look for special Rare Limited Edition Super Bowl helmets with Super Bowl MVP Card on our other listings!
